video.title: Doomsday Preppers
video.synopsis: This series highlights a diverse group of survivalists as they prepare for various catastrophic scenarios that could cause civilization to collapse.

episodes.synopsis: A Houston woman plans to flee to Mexico ahead of an oil shortage, and a planner demonstrates post-earthquake jungle survival techniques.
episodes.title: Bullets, Lots of Bullets

episodes.synopsis: A Utah woman stocks her shelter with only the best foods, and the "Doris Day of Doom" educates her neighbors about an impending earthquake.
episodes.title: I Hope I Am Crazy

episodes.synopsis: A prepper accidentally shoots off part of his thumb, a man readies himself for a food shortage, and a fireman demonstrates urban survival techniques.
episodes.title: Back to the Stone Age

episodes.synopsis: A "survival trucker" and his wife prepare to hit the road, a mother plans a family quarantine, and a prepper protects his home from rising oceans.
episodes.title: It's All Gonna Hit the Fan

episodes.synopsis: A prepper shows off the abandoned missile silo he's converted into a subterranean family home, and a woman prepares her family for martial law.
episodes.title: Friends Can Become Enemies

episodes.synopsis: In the wake of the Fukushima nuclear disaster, a prepper stockpiles more than 11,000 seeds with which to begin a biosphere.
episodes.title: Nine Meals Away from Anarchy

episodes.synopsis: Canadian parents plan to preserve their comfortable home life in the wake of a disaster, and a man prepares for a second Great Depression.
episodes.title: Into the Spider Hole

episodes.synopsis: A man shows off his collection of 42 underground buses meant to protect refugee children, and a Salt Lake City couple prepares for an oil crisis.
episodes.title: It's Gonna Get Worse

episodes.synopsis: Jack Jobe is working on inventing a tool that could help a person hack through rubble, while Bruce Beach has constructed a bunker out of school buses.
episodes.title: Close the Door, Load the Shotgun

episodes.synopsis: A family man prepares for dirty bombs; a retired cop braces for economic destruction by China; and a single dad has a secret hatch in his garage.
episodes.title: Disaster Doesn't Wait

episodes.synopsis: A couple anticipating an economic collapse purchases a shipping container to bury in their backyard. Jason Day plans to take his family underground.
episodes.title: I Suggest We Run

episodes.synopsis: Featuring the first season's most memorable stories, this installment takes a look back at the survivalists busily preparing for the end of the world.
episodes.title: Extreme Prep Edition

episodes.synopsis: A 15-year-old named Jason has been preparing for disaster for four years; Nashville musician Big Al fears a nuclear attack by Russia.
episodes.title: Am I Nuts or Are You?

episodes.synopsis: Husband and father Johnny O fears a terrorist attack on nuclear power plants. A farming family prepares for a series of F5 tornadoes.
episodes.title: You Can't Let Evil Win

episodes.synopsis: Former law enforcement officer Jay Blevins explores prepping for a failed economy and protecting his family.
episodes.title: Bad All The Time

episodes.synopsis: Tom Perez has spent 12 years not working so he can prepare to defend himself against a dirty bomb attack.
episodes.title: The Time of Reckoning

episodes.synopsis: A prepper fears the eruption of the Yellowstone super volcano, while his neighbors have built aquaponic gardens for a self-sustainable lifestyle.
episodes.title: Taking From the Haves

episodes.synopsis: Believing an earthquake will cause massive destruction, Bob Kay has planted hundreds of edible plants and is training his daughter in self-defense.
episodes.title: You've Got Chaos

episodes.synopsis: In the wake of Hurricane Sandy, three New Yorkers try to plot routes out of the city.
episodes.title: Escape from New York

episodes.synopsis: Christine has been using her skills, organization and strictness to prepare for a mega-tsunami caused by Spain's Cumbre Vieja volcano.
episodes.title: Prepared Not Scared

episodes.synopsis: In fear of the world going dark, Brent has constructed a medieval-style fortress. Derek runs a theme park and fears that a solar flare will hit earth.
episodes.title: No Such Thing As a Fair Fight

episodes.synopsis: An Apache descendent in Colorado named Snake Blocker is creating an insular community that can survive if social chaos erupts.
episodes.title: In the Hurt Locker

episodes.synopsis: Heeding a warning in her dreams, Amanda Bobbin and her husband practice sustainable living to prepare for a comet hitting Earth's atmosphere.
episodes.title: Prepper's Paradise

episodes.synopsis: Two former firefighter medics live in the Virginia mountains in fear of an economic collapse, while a mobile prepper prepares for a terrorist attack.
episodes.title: Hit the Ground Running

episodes.synopsis: When he's not converting an abandoned missile silo into a bunker, a prepper hits the web in search of romance with a like-minded lady.
episodes.title: Solutions Not Problems

episodes.synopsis: A third-generation Alaskan prepares a wilderness outpost for a government takeover, while a prepper in Hawaii creates shelter in paradise.
episodes.title: Pain Is Good

episodes.synopsis: A prepper from eastern Washington state shows off the iron bunker sailboat he plans to take to sea in the event of global disaster.
episodes.title: Fortress at Sea

episodes.synopsis: A descendant of the notorious Hatfield clan prepares for martial law in Virginia, and an Oregon restaurateur plans for a terrorist crisis.
episodes.title: Let Her Rip

episodes.synopsis: Two preppers have different plans for surviving an economic collapse: one will wait it out in his backyard bunker, the other in Costa Rica.
episodes.title: Gonna Be A Big Bang

episodes.synopsis: A Florida man trains his son to lead alongside him in a colony of 25 survivalists, who live in the shadow of a grim symbol of law and order.
episodes.title: Don't Betray the Colony

episodes.synopsis: Steve prepares for the chaos that would follow an economic collapse. A comedian dumpster dives to find supplies for a net to hide his emergency gear.
episodes.title: The Gates of Hell

episodes.synopsis: Could an explosion on the surface of the sun cause mayhem on Earth? Jason and Jacob from Alabama are prepping for exactly that.
episodes.title: Whatever It Takes
